caption: Modern Mexican unlike any other place in Brooklyn!

Love the tortillas here! I’ve been swinging by the last couple of weeks trying the different varieties they press. Warming them on the cast iron skillet at home- making breakfast tacos and jack fruit tacos. Really elevates the home cooked meal!  Appreciate the passion of the team at Sobre Masa and the focus on creative food collaboration!

Have you ever tasted an authentic and delicious tortilla? Well, this is the right place to try it, because the tortilla is the key of a good taco and Sobre Masa has the most amazing tortillas in New York (well, out of all places I've gone to in the whereabouts at least). We went on Sunday and ordered the carnitas tacos, tlacoyos and conchas. Everything was full of flavor, really well prepared, absolutely authentic Mexican food. Good service, nice and friendly; the atmosphere is so original just like the food. In summary, this is a great place to eat amazing Mexican cuisine; the reason why I don't give them five stars is because the door was open an the place was freezing in a very cold morning. When you go to a restaurant you expect a cozy place, unfortunately the inside was too cold.
Love everything I’ve ordered - they just launched Saturday Barbacoa that is to die for. The flan is so good it’s dangerous. Plus chips, salsa and of course the tortillas.
Best Carnitas in NY! Everything tasted so authentic and fresh. My boyfriend and I seriously felt like we were back in Quiroga, Michoacán. The salsas, tortillas and chips are all delicious.  10/10

Best Mexican I have found in Brooklyn. Love this local neighbourhood spot. The food is constantly fantastic (Try the ribs and the lamb barbacoa). The space is also beautiful and open, which makes you feel safe in the current environment. Plus they have a cool record store in the back. Well worth the trip!!
Without a doubt the best tortillas and flan in the city. Really thoughtfully made interpretations of Oaxacan market food. Great space, great food.
Assuming the 5-star reviews are for dinner because brunch was just decent. Ordered the tiny breakfast tacos (2) and wished I’d gone elsewhere for a more reasonably priced substantial meal.

Incredible Oaxacan food in a beautiful environment. Every single thing on the menu is delicious. The best tortillas EVER and great margs and music! They also have an impressive natural wine list :) can’t wait to go back!
Amazing Mexican food using fresh tortillas from masa ground in house. Mole, tacos, guacamole, ribs, flan, ribs...stop reading this and go. You'll be missing out if you don't
Best tortillas in New York, hands down. Sobre Masa sets a new standard for Mexican food in the city. Chef Zack is our hero!
